gen_ed_major_overlap_note: 6 of the 45 credits for General Education are included in the Requirements for the Major (6 GQ).

major_requirements.c_required_policy: Grade of C or better required in courses designated by the major as a C-required course.

prescribed_courses_c_required.title: Ethical Issues in Data Science Practice
Data Science Through Statistical Reasoning and Computation

additional_courses_c_required.description: Select one Introduction to Programming course
options: CMPSC 131 Programming and Computation I: Fundamentals
CMPSC 132 Programming and Computation II: Data Structures

option_requirements.description: Select one option. Only Computational Data Sciences is available through the College of Engineering at University Park.

prescribed_courses_c_required.title: Object Oriented Programming with Web-Based Applications

additional_courses_c_required.description: Select Intro Data Science or Statistics course

supporting_courses_related_areas.description: Select from Computational Option List A (Appendix C - List not provided in source text)
supporting_courses_related_areas.note: Students may apply up to 3 credits of ROTC as option list credits and 3 credits of ROTC as GHW credits.

supporting_courses_related_areas.description: Select from Computational Option List B (Appendix C - List not provided in source text)
supporting_courses_related_areas.note: Students may apply up to 3 credits of ROTC as option list credits and 3 credits of ROTC as GHW credits.

foundations.description: Grade of C or better required. Inter-Domain courses do not meet this requirement.

breadth_in_knowledge_domains.description: Inter-Domain courses do not meet this requirement.

ga_gh_gn_gs_inter_domain_or_world_langua.description: This may include 3 credits of World Language course work beyond the 12th credit level or degree requirements, whichever is higher.

first_year_engagement.description: Required for University Park students. Specified by college First-Year Engagement Plan.

writing_across_curriculum.description: Required from the college of graduation, likely prescribed as part of major requirements.

total_minimum_degree_credits.description: Minimum credits for any baccalaureate degree.

quality_of_work.description: Minimum grade-point average for all courses completed within the degree program.

limitations_on_source_time.description: Potential requirement for credits taken at the degree location/college.
